name: RothTouchline
0:
”Alexa, tell Roth Touchline, what zones do I have?”
”Alexa tell Roth Touchline, turn on kitchen.”
”Alexa, tell Roth Touchline to set the temperature”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: roth touchline
des: Allows you to control your home heating systems which are connected to an Roth Touchline account.
